The automated test report.

Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1.download eclispse automated test eclipse-Automated-Tests-3.2.1.zip
2.download eclipse platform eclipse-SDK-3.2.1-linux-gtk-x86.tar.gz
3.upzip eclipse-Automated-Tests-3.2.1.zip and copy eclipse package to the folder and run runtest -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86 -vm /opt/java/jdk1.6.0_02/bin/java |tee -a console.log


More information:
OS: RedHat Enterprise3 
JDK: jdk-6u2-linux-i586.bin
Hardware: HP XW8400
eclipse binary package:eclipse-SDK-3.2.1-linux-gtk
The cases are passed when I use jdk1.5.0_12 but failed in jdk1.6.0_02
The attachment seems to be unreadable. Can you provide a stack trace?
